description:
Savory 4-cheese pasta loaded with moist grilled chicken to help you refuel after a hard day on the trail.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: pasta (wheat), cheddar cheese powder (cheddar cheese [milk, salt, bacterial cultures, enzymes], disodium phosphate, *may contain sodium aluminum silicate), grilled seasoned chicken breast with rib meat (chicken breast with rib meat, salt, potato starch, onion and garlic powder, spice), romano cheese powder (romano cheese [milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), shredded monterey jack cheese (milk, salt, enzymes, potato starch), carrot, broccoli florets, milk ingredients, potato starch, onion, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), dried garlic, sea salt, spinach, and green onion
  • Allergens - contains: milk and wheat
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Grilled Chicken Quattro Formaggi Pasta
